column2: Force §G[Root.GetDynName]§! to become a §GChild of Destiny§!.
Force §Gyourself§! to become a §GChild of Destiny§!.
Hides all 'Touch of Fate' decisions in interaction menu.
Show 'Touch of Fate 'decisions in interaction menu.
This character is meant for great things.
This character is meant for terrible things.
This character hears the call of the wild.
This character is meant for WAR.
Touch of Fate - Child of Destiny decision
Player can §Gforce any child to become a Child of Destiny§! by choosing the 'Grant Destiny' option in the interaction menu.
Child of Destiny targeted decision cheat is disabled.
Touch of Fate - Demon Child decision
Player can §Rforce any child to become a Demon Child§! by choosing the 'Grant Demonhood' option in the interaction menu.
Demon Child targeted decision cheat is disabled.
Children of Destiny §Gwill§! be given the neutral trait '§GDestined§!' in order to make them more identifiable.
Children of Destiny will not be given an identifying trait.
Demon Children §Rwill§! be given the neutral trait '§RDemonic§!' in order to make them more identifiable.
Demon Children will not be given an identifying trait.
Touch of Fate - Wolf Child decision
Player can §Kforce any child to become a Wolf Child§! by choosing the 'Grant Wolf Blood' option in the interaction menu.
Wolf Child targeted decision cheat is disabled.
Touch of Fate - Great Conqueror decision
Player can §Bforce any character to become a Great Conqueror§! by choosing the 'Grant Conqueror's Will' option in the interaction menu.
Great Conqueror targeted decision cheat is disabled.
Wolf Children §Kwill§! be given the neutral trait '§KWolfblooded§!' in order to make them more identifiable.
Wolf Children will not be given an identifying trait.
Great Conquerors §Bwill§! be given the neutral trait '§BSubjugator§!' in order to make them more identifiable.
Great Conquerors will not be given an identifying trait.
Player can §Gforce any character to become Immortal§! by choosing the 'Grant Immortality' option in the interaction menu.
Immortality targeted decision cheat is disabled.
